messages.content: Hello, In this part of the interview process we will start with your resume round. Are you ready?
Yes let's start
Can you introduce yourself?
I would like to leave this interview.
You have an option to continue this round later. Do you want to exit?
I am continuing.
Please continue with the previous question - Can you introduce yourself?
yes, my name is Hriday. I live in Mumbai, Maharashtra.
Great, Hriday. Moving on to the next question. Can you explain your project Online Voting System?
Sorry, I am not able to recall.
Shall we move ahead?
Okay.
Okay, Hriday. Moving on to the next question. Can you tell me what all aspects you took into consideration for a good user experience?
Let's skip to the next question.
Okay,Hriday. This question is being skipped. Could you tell me more about your project Deep Image Classifier?
Let's skip to the next question.
Okay,Hriday. This question is being skipped. Why did you not use CNN to build the deep image classifier?
CNN is mostly suitable for images, and RNN is what I used. It's best suited for data like words, texts which is what the dataset had.
Nice, Hriday. Moving on to the next question. Why did you use Tensorflow?
Pytorch is a great tool provides all the features to build complex Machine Learning applications as well as it does have a good community support.
Your answer is not satisfactory. Please try again.
Let's skip to the next question.
Okay, Hriday. This question is being skipped. Can you tell me about your experience at Evaluaitor?
I was a Machine Learning Intern at EvaluAItor.
And what were your responsibilities at Evaluaitor?
I played an important role in fine-tuning and creating new datasets for the model.
What type of new datasets did you create at Evaluaitor?
They were training and validation datasets for the model.
Could you also explain how these datasets are used by the model you worked on at Evaluaitor?
No I am not sure.
Shall we move ahead?
Let's skip to the next question.
Okay, Hriday. This question is being skipped. I can see that you've mentioned mySQL as your skill. Could you tell me more about it?
Let's skip to the next question.
Okay, Hriday. This question is being skipped. Could you tell me what BLOBS are?
BLOB is an acronym that stands for a binary large object. It is used to hold a variable amount of data.
Nice Hriday. Can you tell me the types of BLOB
I am anxious
Take a deep breath, you've got this!
Tiny BLOB, BLOB, Medium BLOB, Long BLOB.
Nice Hriday. What are the different types of relatonships possible in MySQL?
Its one to one, one to many and many to many.
Could you tell me what many to many relationship is?
In a many-to-many relationship, many rows in one table are linked to many rows in another table.
Correct, Hriday. I can see that you've mentioned C++ as your skill. Could you tell me more about it?
I've mainly used it for competitive programming.
Great, Hriday.Could you tell me what language is C++ superset of?
I don't know.
Shall we move ahead?
I don't know.
You could answer this question or move ahead.
I don't know.
As I didn't find any suitable response from you, moving on to the next question. Could you tell me what type of sort does C++ use for sorting?
Give me some time to think.
Sure, take your time.
I think it's Introsort.
Correct, Hriday. Could you tell me the difference between map and set in C++?
I don't know.
Shall we move ahead?
Map and set are pretty much the same.
Your answer is not satisfactory. Please try again.
Let's skip to the next question.
Okay Hriday ,thank you for your time. You can click on exit to leave this interview. We will get back to you soon.
Thanks.
You will be able to see the results as well as the feedback on EvaluAItor dashboard. Goodbye and have a good day ahead.
